articles.title: Gautam Adani Overtakes Mukesh Ambani As India's Richest As Net Worth Soars - NDTV
articles.description: After a roller-coaster ride on the wealth rankings last year, Gautam Adani is back to being Asia's wealthiest person days after Supreme court said no new probes were needed into Hindenburg Research's bombshell allegations.
articles.content:
Adani Group's stocks rallied after Supreme Court this week.
